content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
My AC is making a weird noise and not cooling right. Send someone out to fix it.
I’m happy to help you with your AC issue. Could I please get your name to start the booking process?
No, just send the repair guy. You don’t need my name. This is taking too long already.
I understand you’d like to get this taken care of quickly. In order to send someone, I’ll also need your address. Can you let me know where our technician should go?
Just look it up! My phone number should tell you. Fix my AC already! This is ridiculous.
Unfortunately, I can’t access your address from just your phone number. In order to help you, I need you to provide your address.
You’re just wasting my time. What’s the point of an automated system if it can’t do anything? Forget it.
reason: Customer refused to provide required information.
